name: Milo & the Magical Stones
description: Based on the children's book character created by Marcus Pfister, this program introduces Milo, a mischievous little mouse who lives peacefully on an island with other little mice. One day, he discovers a glowing stone in a cave and decides to take it back to the village. The stone has magical warming powers, and Milo and his friends set out to find more stones to keep the mice warm all winter. Children help out by guiding the mice around the island, meeting characters, making friends, and solving logic puzzles. ... Kids will experience 20 different worlds inhabited by engaging, 3-D characters. Eight individual action games are well integrated into the adventure. Players work through six puzzles within a story that has six possible endings with one final end. Two levels of difficulty add to the value and fun (Adventure Legends).
